sentences.english: You have only a superficial knowledge of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 你對該學科只有粗淺的瞭解。

sentences.english: Wasn’t fake or shallow with comments to students
sentences.chinese: 對學生的評論不虛假，不粗淺。

sentences.english: Even what you learn during the four years of university will be sth quite superficial too.
sentences.chinese: 就是大學四年，所授課業也還是相當粗淺的學識。

sentences.english: This paper is divided into five chapters to put forward suggestions on sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 本文共分爲五章來對性騷擾問題進行粗淺的分析。

sentences.english: This article attempts to make some shallow discussions in this aspect.
sentences.chinese: 本文試圖從這方面作一些粗淺的探討。

sentences.english: This article try to make this superficial discussion.
sentences.chinese: 本文試對此作粗淺的探討。

sentences.english: Several items of main clews for the teaching of steel structure is presented in the paper .
sentences.chinese: 以下談談十幾年來對鋼結構課程教學的一些粗淺體會。

sentences.english: When all the other flowers bloom, She just smile among them.
sentences.chinese: 括號裏的可以省略，還是很粗淺，見笑。

sentences.english: This article on vocal music teaching in esthetic question test shallow exploration.
sentences.chinese: 本文就聲樂教學中的審美化問題試作粗淺探索。

sentences.english: The feature of the shear slide zone of the Wudu area are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 就武都地區滑坡的剪切滑動帶特徵作一粗淺探討。

definition: to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
